sql-select.name: GetInstanceSystemStatisticalFunctions
sql-select.sql-select-text: SELECT t.[EventTime] AS [EventTime] ,t.[Connections] AS [Connections] ,t.[CPUBusy] AS [CPUBusy] ,t.[CPUIdle] AS [CPUIdle] ,t.[IOBusy] AS [IOBusy] ,t.[PackReceived] AS [PackReceived] ,t.[PackSent] AS [PackSent] ,t.[PacketErrors] AS [PacketErrors] ,t.[TimeTicks] AS [TimeTicks] ,t.[TotalErrors] AS [TotalErrors] ,t.[TotalRead] AS [TotalRead] ,t.[TotalWrite] AS [TotalWrite] FROM [hist].[h_InstanceSystemStatisticalFunctions] t INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[rowid] = t.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = @d_ServerInstance_id WHERE CASE WHEN ((@EventDayMin IS NOT NULL) AND (@EventDayMax IS NOT NULL)) THEN t.[EventDay] BETWEEN date(@EventDayMin) AND date(@EventDayMax) WHEN (@strDateTimeModifier IS NOT NULL) THEN t.[EventTime] > ( SELECT DATETIME(MAX(t.[EventTime]), @strDateTimeModifier) FROM [hist].[h_InstanceSystemStatisticalFunctions] t INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[rowid] = t.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = @d_ServerInstance_id ) ELSE t.[EventDay] = date('1900-01-01') END ORDER BY t.[EventTime] ASC ;
